title: First, Physical Strength!
detail_text: <:th_ch0103/>Nijigaku’s next live has been decided right! Congrats! I look forward to seeing it~. If there’s anything that I can help with, do tell<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Thank you, Kanan-san. Then, can I take you up on that offer right away….?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Of course!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>I want to build up my physical strength. To to be able to get a lot of practice and give a good performance, I think I would need physical strength first<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>I see. What have you done up to now?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Running and muscle training. But I don’t think those are enough….<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>….Alright! I have a special training plan that I came up with myself, The Hell Triathlon!! Before I have Aqours do it, I’ll tell you about it, Setsuna-chan!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Eh, is that okay!?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Yeah♪<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0207/>Thank you very much! But, “hell” huh…. It sounds like something Yoshiko-san would like…. I would feel bad for having it all for myself, so if you don’t mind, shall we invite Yoshiko-san to do it with the two of us?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Let’s get Yoshiko-chan then. Alright, here we go!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
